fgeo.map 0.0.0.9204
  • Reference
  • fgeo

Map species, trees and topography

Installation

Install all fgeo packages in one step

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("forestgeo/fgeo.map")

For details on how to install packages from GitHub, see this article.

Example

library(fgeo.map)

census <- fgeo.data::luquillo_tree6_random
some_sp <- subset(census, sp %in% c("PREMON", "CASARB"))
map_sp_elev(some_sp)

Get started with fgeo
